We are a research group at Université Laval dedicated to the understanding of complex networks.

    November 14, 2011

    Frank Vollmer (MPI for the Science of Light) will visit Dynamica between the 14th to 17th of Novembre.

    The world-renowned biosensor par excellence Dr. Vollmer will be presenting 2 talks in the Physics Department: a general public Colloquium (15 Nov.) entitled “Resonator-based Biosensing and Light Localization” as well as a more technical Seminar (16 Nov.) on “Microcavity Biosensors: Application of a label-free microsystem biodetection technology”. More details can...
